statements: DELETE FROM basketball_game_tickets WHERE event_date = '2023-06-15' AND total_tickets_sold > 500;

DELETE FROM seating_arrangements WHERE venue_id = 500 AND section = 'VIP' AND is_reserved = FALSE;

DELETE FROM tickets WHERE seat_number = 101 AND game_id = 2001;
